title: REAL Scandal: Cruz or Cuomo? | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Ken Paxton | 2/19/21
description:
Stu’s house flooded after a pipe burst during the winter storm. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton joins to discuss an investigation into ERCOT’s questionable handling of the power outages. Bill O’Reilly gives his take on Sen. Ted Cruz’s trip to Cancun, whether Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s nursing home scandal will end his political career, the passing of Rush Limbaugh, possible Puerto Rico statehood, and President Biden’s latest racist statement. Radio host Tammy Bruce joins with the story of how Rush Limbaugh helped her go from president of the Los Angeles chapter of the National Organization of Women to an independent conservative. President Biden will cooperate more with Europe as the U.N. pushes what sure sounds like the Great Reset.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
